title: Medium
content: For a long time, I was thinking about a tool that would provide a set of CSS custom properties with the mouse position, scroll position, random values etc. And since I didn't find anything that I would like, I decided to write the tool myself. I called it "Medium" because it connects CSS and JS worlds. The library itself is quite simple, but I used it for a few demos on CodePen and it really speeds things up. Now it's [available on GitHub](https://github.com/sfi0zy/medium) and as an [NPM package](https://www.npmjs.com/package/css.medium.js).
